item.title: [PI] Yell Capslock?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Mendorphins:

^Yeah but if they log in as “soap” the it’d be lowercase and if he’s any type of perfectionist like myself, my way would guarantee an Uppercase letter every time.

Yeah, don’t want to go into detail for him though.

Or he could make the first letter after a ‘space’ in the username be a capital.

Instead of logging in as ‘username: mopar scape’ it would be
‘username: Mopar Scape’

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Yell Capslock?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Change this

+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

To

+ c.playerName +": " + playerCommand.substring(5);

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Yell Capslock?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

He logged in as “Soap” and Misc.optimizeText uppercases the first lowercase char it comes too… you need to use something like

[code=java]

yell(Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + playerName(1) + ": "
+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));[/code]

Adapt to your methods and I’m not sure if you have to import anything?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Yell Capslock?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

When you logged into the game did you type your username as SOap? I know from my server that if you use something like “aAbBcC” it will appear in chat like “Aabbcc” but on yell it will appear as “aAbBcC”.

item.title: [PI] Yell Capslock?
item.dc:creator: @soapface soapface
item.description:
@soapface wrote:

When ever I say something in yell, I get an extra capslock when I talk.

Picture -

My yell command:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if (c.playerRights == 1){ 
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=38911>[Moderator]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 2){
   
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=16762702>[Administrator]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 4){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 0){
     c2.sendMessage("<shad=16777215>[Member]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");</blockquote>

Read full topic
